PoolName.description: The name of the dedicated IP pool.
PoolName.markdownDescription:
The name of the dedicated IP pool.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^[a-z0-9_-]{0,64}$  

Update requires: No interruption

ScalingMode.description: Specifies whether the dedicated IP pool is managed or not. The default value is STANDARD.
ScalingMode.markdownDescription:
Specifies whether the dedicated IP pool is managed or not. The default value is STANDARD.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^(STANDARD|MANAGED)$  

Update requires: No interruption
